replies.body: Why is lulu in the dangerous to go alone bundle? She can't one shot anyone
Lulu is never alone (Pix).

They all have some sort of companion.
Elise: Spiderlings
Fizz: Chum of the Waters
Lulu: Pix
Malz: Voidlings
Annie: Tibbers!
Yeah, but Sej always has Bristle and she didn't make the cut

Yet {{champion:104}}  couldn't have a [](https://images.search.yahoo.com/images/view;_ylt=AwrTcYB1QnNZHaMARh4unIlQ;_ylu=X3oDMTIzYmp0aXQ3BHNlYwNzcgRzbGsDaW1nBG9pZAM0NTNkMGIyZjRiMTE4ZGVkNmMyMWU5N2U2OGUzYjIzOQRncG9zAzE2BGl0A2Jpbmc-?.origin=&back=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.search.yahoo.com%2Fyhs%2Fsearch%3Fp%3Dgraves%2BcigAR%26fr%3Dyhs-mozilla-002%26fr2%3Dpiv-web%26hsimp%3Dyhs-002%26hspart%3Dmozilla%26tab%3Dorganic%26ri%3D16&w=1600&h=900&imgurl=2.bp.blogspot.com%2F-4Y3--fSJZf4%2FWQuXtTOhwbI%2FAAAAAAAAkks%2F9ijuhadgYYoJ7urkwUCAxUtNjQZ19BvEQCLcB%2Fs1600%2Fgraves_header.jpg&rurl=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.surrenderat20.net%2F2017%2F05%2Fred-post-collection-may-4th-mid-patch.html&size=86.6KB&name=...+%3Cb%3EGraves+%26%2339%3B+cigar%3C%2Fb%3E+%28in-game+assets+in+7.9%21%29%2C+Lulu%26%2339%3Bs+cupcakes%2C+and+more&p=graves+cigAR&oid=453d0b2f4b118ded6c21e97e68e3b239&fr2=piv-web&fr=yhs-mozilla-002&tt=...+%3Cb%3EGraves+%26%2339%3B+cigar%3C%2Fb%3E+%28in-game+assets+in+7.9%21%29%2C+Lulu%26%2339%3Bs+cupcakes%2C+and+more&b=0&ni=21&no=16&ts=&tab=organic&sigr=12fssvsks&sigb=14725r8uu&sigi=13kkkva6v&sigt=12lte0qt1&sign=12lte0qt1&.crumb=j2GqHXSXfU8&fr=yhs-mozilla-002&fr2=piv-web&hsimp=yhs-002&hspart=mozilla) .
And Braum always has Poro's!
Broaden your horizons.
For some reason, these bundles aren't showing up in the bundle section of my store even though I do not own all the skins.
Hey! I was responsible for that. I was messing with some things in the backend and accidentally turned off the bundles, but they're back up again now - so sorry for the delay!
13 hours later in NA, still not showing up for me.

Why is Fizz in the It's Dangerous to go alone bundle?  He just calls a shark for his ult, which just chomps the enemy and leaves....At least Tibbers hangs around with Annie for a bit.  You could've put Yorick, Azir, Maokai, or Ivern in this bundle, it would've made more sense.
They all have pets (except for {{champion:17}} )
Why is Caitlyn not in the Sniper Bundle but Jinx is?
I believe the theme they were going for was champs with long range abilities you have to aim yourself. Cait's big damage, long range ability is a point and click.
Where it at tho ?
I'm not seeing this live yet. Anyone else having this issue?
The Pokemon reference though
Change Name Card 50% off is never back again?????
I think it comes around the end of the seasons.
Can we have a bundle full of hooded champs like redeemed riven annie in wonderland.etc.

hehe....size doesn't matter....
